main_definition: Specifically; used to introduce precise details or clarifications.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To identify a specific example or detail
meanings_and_examples.example: There are many benefits of exercise, namely improved cardiovascular health and better mood.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To provide an explicit statement about something previously mentioned
meanings_and_examples.example: We need to reduce our expenses; namely, we should cut down on unnecessary office supplies.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used as a synonym for 'that is' or 'in other words', when rephrasing the preceding information
meanings_and_examples.example: The concert was postponed; namely, it will take place next month instead of this one.
